Waltham.Perez Smith House: The Perez Smith House is a historic house at 46 Lincoln Street in Waltham, Massachusetts. The 2½ story wood frame house was built in 1851 and is one of the city's finest transitional Greek Revival/Italianate houses. It has a typical Italianate three-bay facade, deep cornice with decorative brackets, and round-arch windows in the gable.
